nodes.text: The Fujari were a group of pirates that committed various acts of piracy in the Rseik sector around the time of the Bordal Contagion. They raided a Galactic Republic convoy attempting to bring the antidote to the Bordali, which caused the cure for the contagion to be ruined. Various organizations in the sector allied with the Trade Federation in order to defeat the Fujari and other pirates.

Soon after this, the Trade Federation sent ships to the Fujari's asteroid base, where the Fujari were ultimately defeated within a timespan of a week of the destruction of the Hajara gang, another pirate organization.
